subject.description: The email subject line, starting with the BLUF tag followed by a concise summary (e.g., 'ACTION: Submit Timesheets by Friday').

bluf_tag.description: The BLUF tag selected based on the email's intent.

bluf_summary.description: A two-sentence plain-language summary of the email, capturing the Bottom Line Up Front.

email.description: The full email body, formatted with the BLUF structure (BLUF header, purpose, BLUF summary, and the original email text).
